visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have custom styling for axes and labels, with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include two series named 'Temperature 2022' and 'Temperature 2023', with corresponding data. Additionally, the chart should have custom colors for the series and a legend with a horizontal layout and an item distance of 50 pixels.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart includes custom styling for the title, axes, and labels, with specific colors and font sizes. The x-axis categories represent the months of the year, and the y-axis represents temperature in degrees Celsius. The data series include two sets of monthly temperature data for the years 2022 and 2023, each with a distinct color. The legend is configured to have a horizontal layout with an item distance of 50 pixels. Additionally, the chart includes a marker for each data point in the spline series, and the credits are disabled to clean up the chart appearance.
